content: "http://www.smh.com.au/world/warning-that-pakistan-is-in-danger-of-collapse-within-months-20090412-a40u.html" "PAKISTAN could collapse within months, one of the more influential counter-insurgency voices in Washington says. The warning comes as the US scrambles to redeploy its military forces and diplomats in an attempt to stem rising violence and anarchy in Afghanistan and Pakistan." Very concerning. If this happens some nut job is going to get thier hands on some nukes. Is the U.S. going to once again have to step up to the plate and do what we gota do to ensure this does not happen? Should We? If we don't who will? The UN? NATO?

title: Warning that Pakistan is in danger of collapse within months
